article_title: A GOP Vision of Health Reform From a Bush (but Not That Bush)
article_text: You need to LOG IN to edit your watchlist.

article_metadata.description: The former president's cousin says freer markets can cut health care costs and create great companies. The core of the Bush prescription is radically more competition in health care.
article_metadata.author: Tim Mullaney
